Location.Description: You are standing in the a peaceful city park at a memorial fountain, a central area where all of the footpaths meet up at the center of the park. A mixture of bright and shiny coins glitter from the bottom, at least those that aren't covered up by last autumn's fallen leaves. A ring of cement benches line the fountain with a strangely lifelike and clean-looking stone statue of a well-endowed girl. Is she one of your magic slinger peers? You can't tell.
